Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.db.dao

Class AbstractDaoFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.db.dao.AbstractDaoFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MysqlDaoFactory
    public abstract class AbstractDaoFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A abstract factory class which ancestors provide an instance of different DAOs to communicate with the database. The type of datasource factory is specified in dao.fqn property.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AbstractDaoFactory getInstance()
                                      throws DaoException
        Realization of a classical singleton.
        Returns:
        instance field if it has been instantiated, otherwise instantiates and then returns.
        Throws:
        DaoException - is thrown if DAO cannot be instantiated.
